actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Commissioner of the District of Columbia to permit certain improvements to a business property situated in the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Authorizes the Commissioner of the District of Columbia to permit improvements to a business property on square 2695, lot numbered 800 (east side of 16th St., between Arkansas Ave. and Upshur St., N. W.) situated in the District of Columbia.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Commissioner of the District of Columbia to permit certain improvements to a business property situated in the District of Columbia.
